name: PreviewCard.Root
description:
Groups all parts of the preview card.
Doesnâ€™t render its own HTML element.

defaultOpen.description: Whether the preview card is initially open.

open.description: Whether the preview card is currently open.

onOpenChange.description: Event handler called when the preview card is opened or closed.
onOpenChange.detailedType:
| ((
    open: boolean,
    eventDetails: PreviewCard.Root.ChangeEventDetails,
  ) => void)
| undefined

onOpenChangeComplete.description: Event handler called after any animations complete when the preview card is opened or closed.

delay.description: How long to wait before the preview card opens. Specified in milliseconds.

closeDelay.description: How long to wait before closing the preview card. Specified in milliseconds.
